response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and rarity, we believe it would be a significant asset to your collection or business. We understand its worth to you is $1,000,000, and we aim to bridge the gap between our valuation and yours. Our proposed offer for the product is $1,250,000. This price reflects our commitment to fair negotiation while ensuring a reasonable return on our investment. We hope this proposal aligns with your expectations and allows us to proceed with a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of doing business with you.", "product_price": 1250000}
